component.name: associateAnExistingEntity
component.description: Associate an existing entity with the collection-valued navigation property or single valued navigation property for an specific entity with that entity primary key value.

component.name: removeEntityReferenceForCollectionValuedProperty
component.description: Disassociate or remove reference to an entity using collection valued navigation property.

component.name: removeEntityReferenceForSingleValuedProperty
component.description: Disassociate or remove reference to an entity using single valued navigation property.
